Class ServiceSuccessfulTests

java.lang.Object
br.inatel.dragrace.service.ServiceSuccessfulTests
@ExtendWith(org.mockito.junit.jupiter.MockitoExtension.class) @SpringBootTest @ActiveProfiles("test") public class ServiceSuccessfulTests extends Object
